mapper.select: SELECT list_id AS listId, user_id AS userId, content, is_completed AS isCompleted , created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM todolist WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY list_id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE todolist SET is_completed = CASE WHEN is_completed = 1 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END WHERE list_id = #{listId}
